name: A Magician's Hike
description:
A magician in the mountains fears no puzzling situation and attracts cute animals. She has mastered the art of throwing a Magician's Hat and you will also learn how powerful that technique can be. If you can reach the end of the path, of course.

This game was made in slightly less than 48hrs for the Thinky Puzzles Game Jam 2, on the theme "A Magician's Hat". Made in Pattern:Script (using features in beta version).
